title: Gender distribution of newspaper journalists in the U.S. 2017 , by publication
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 14 different Newspapers on X-axis for 2 groups Female, and Male. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of journalists.
In Newspaper USA Today, Male had the highest Share of journalists 69.0 among the 2 groups and in USA Today, Female had the lowest Share of journalists 31.0.
Among all the Newspapers, Male had the highest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today and lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer.
Newspaper USA Today and The Philadelphia Inquirer had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of journalists found for Male.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 14 different Newspapers on X-axis for 2 groups Female, and Male. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of journalists.
Out of all 2 groups, Male had the highest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today and Female had the lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 14 different Newspapers on X-axis for 2 groups Female, and Male. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of journalists.
In Newspaper USA Today, Male had the highest Share of journalists 69.0 among the 2 groups and in USA Today, Female had the lowest Share of journalists 31.0.
Among all the Newspapers, Male had the highest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today and lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer.
Newspaper USA Today and The Philadelphia Inquirer had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of journalists found for Male.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 14 different Newspapers on X-axis for 2 groups Female, and Male. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of journalists.
Out of all 2 groups, Male had the highest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today and Female had the lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today.
In Newspaper USA Today, Male had the highest Share of journalists among all 14 Newspapers and it has the lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of journalists found for Male in Newspaper USA Today and The Philadelphia Inquirer.
Among the groups, Female had the biggest difference in Share of journalists. Where the maximum Share of journalists was 1.55 times larger than the minimum Share of journalists.
Averaging all 2 groups Female, and Male, the Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer is the maximum Share of journalists and USA Today is the minimum Share of journalists.
